main.description: Official OpenHexa website - Open source data platform for global development

ProductOverview.Summary: OpenHexa is an open-source data platform designed to support global development initiatives by providing tools for data collection, analysis, and visualization.
ProductOverview.Description: OpenHexa offers a comprehensive suite of data tools including data collection forms, analytics dashboards, and visualization capabilities. It is designed to be user-friendly for non-technical users while providing powerful features for data scientists and developers.
ProductOverview.PrimaryFunctionality: Data platform with collection, analysis, and visualization tools
ProductOverview.Users: Data collectors, analysts, researchers, and development practitioners

Reach.SummaryOfReach: OpenHexa has been used in various global development projects to support data-driven decision making and program monitoring.

Maturity.SummaryOfMaturity: All maturity model assessments are self-reported by the funded organization leading the development of the global good.

Community.DescriptionOfCommunity: OpenHexa is developed and maintained by a global community focused on data-driven development solutions.

HostAnchorOrganization.name: OpenHexa
HostAnchorOrganization.description: Open source data platform for global development

Sustainability.Description: OpenHexa is supported through open source development and community contributions.
